author: Ira Cohen and Fabio Gagliardi Cozman and Nicu Sebe and Marcelo Cesar Cirelo and Thomas S. Huang
title: Semisupervised Learning of Classifiers: Theory, Algorithms, and Their Application to Human-Computer Interaction
venue: IEEE Trans. Pattern Anal. Mach. Intell, 26
window: EM-TAN can sometimes improve performance over TAN with just labeled data (Shuttle). With the Chess dataset, discarding the unlabeled data and using only TAN seems the best approach. We have compared two likelihood based structure learning methods (K2 and MCMC) on the same datasets as well [20], showing
